Articles.Content: My hover craft is an unmanned OKTO2 with a reaction wheel and elevons I can't post any pictures but if i find out how i'll do it.

How to upload pictures:

1. Go to imgur.com

 Drag photos into website, it'll do the rest for you. If you have multiple photos, make sure you create an album and name it.

2. Find your image gallery code. Its the xxyyxx in:

 imgur.com/xxyyxx

3. in the forum, edit your post and put in your code into this: [imgur.]xxyyxx[/imgur.] (note that you don't put the periods in the actual thing)

4. Viola!
